statements: SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_location='New York';
SELECT event_name, organizer_name FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(event_id) AS total_events FROM events WHERE organizer_name='John Doe';
SELECT event_name, event_date, organizer_name FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_location = 'New York' AND organizer_name = 'John Smith' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT event_name, COUNT(event_id) AS total_events FROM events GROUP BY event_name HAVING COUNT(event_id) > 1;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date, event_location FROM events WHERE event_location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY event_location;
SELECT event_name, organizer_name FROM events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY organizer_name ASC, event_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_location, event_date FROM events;
SELECT organizer_name, organizer_email FROM organizers;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location, organizer_name FROM events;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_location FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT organizer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM events GROUP BY organizer_name;
SELECT organizers.organizer_name, events.event_name FROM organizers JOIN events ON organizers.organizer_name = events.organizer_name;
SELECT event_name, event_location, event_date FROM events WHERE organizer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT organizer_name, contact_email FROM organizers ORDER BY organizer_name DESC;
SELECT location_name, capacity FROM locations WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY capacity ASC;
SELECT event_name, organizer_name, l.location_name FROM events e JOIN organizers o ON e.organizer_name = o.organizer_name JOIN locations l ON e.event_location = l.location_name;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE organizer_name='ABC Organizers';
SELECT event_name, event_location, capacity FROM events JOIN locations ON events.event_location = locations.location_name;
SELECT event_name, organizer_name, contact_email FROM events JOIN organizers ON events.organizer_name = organizers.organizer_name;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events WHERE event_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2021-10-01';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events WHERE event_location LIKE '%Hall%';
SELECT organizer_name, organizer_email FROM organizers ORDER BY organizer_name DESC;
SELECT location_name, location_address, location_capacity FROM locations WHERE location_capacity > 100;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM events;
SELECT event_id, event_name, organizer_name FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM organizers WHERE organizer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT event_id, event_name, location_name FROM events JOIN locations ON events.event_location = locations.location_name;
SELECT event_name, COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants FROM events JOIN event_participants ON events.event_id = event_participants.event_id GROUP BY event_name;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT organizer_name, organizer_email FROM organizers ORDER BY organizer_name ASC;
SELECT attendee_name, event_name FROM attendees JOIN events ON attendees.event_id = events.event_id;
SELECT location_name, location_capacity FROM locations WHERE location_capacity > 100 ORDER BY location_capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location, organizer_name FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' AND event_location LIKE '%Hall%' ORDER BY event_date ASC;

SELECT e.event_name, o.organizer_name, ea.check_in, ea.check_out FROM events e JOIN organizers o ON e.organizer_name = o.organizer_name JOIN event_attendance ea ON e.event_id = ea.event_id WHERE ea.check_in >= '2022-06-01' AND ea.check_out <= '2022-07-01';
SELECT DISTINCT e.event_name, l.location_name, l.location_address, l.location_capacity FROM events e JOIN locations l ON e.event_location = l.location_name ORDER BY l.location_capacity DESC;

SELECT a.attendee_name, a.attendee_email, e.event_name, e.event_date, ea.check_in, ea.check_out FROM attendees a JOIN event_attendance ea ON a.attendee_id = ea.attendee_id JOIN events e ON ea.event_id = e.event_id WHERE e.event_date BETWEEN '2022-08-01' AND '2022-12-31';
